title: Pug'maw should be changed or not be released. (Consider this Riot)

embed.description: This is a teaser spotlight of Pug'Maw with ingame gameplay! Purchase RP via Amazon (NA): http://amzn.to/2leXAxO Price: 975RP Skin name is CONFIRMED as Pug'Maw, particles & SFX may not be final. Check out the other skins in this cycle. Full Skin Spotlight will be released in the near future which will go more indepth.

body:
Just my two cents of why pug'maw should get a change or not even be released.
The skin itself is cool and all, but most of us know that the skin doesn't belong in League of legends even as a april fools skin.

Two comments taken from reddit by LastDreamy and QualitySupport, explains why Pug'maw isn't the most fitting skin and a potential fix for the skin that Riot should consider insted of scraping the skin like Sewn Chaos Amumu and Blitz.

-A lot of comments here are stating that this skin doesn't belong in League and they're right. I don't get how Riot can withdraw Sewn Chaos Amumu and Blitz which were very cool skins for the price given but release an odd textured skin that looks nothing like the champion and really breaks the visual equality the game has. Not saying it's not cute, but it looks like a custom fanmade skin and i would really have issues with it ingame. Add to that the current Kog void V.O to an actual IRL DOG and you get yourself a wtf moment. Things just don't make sense...i guess Riot just do what they want when they feel like it.
I'm not fully hating on it, in fact i find it cute because it's a dog, but i just don't understand Riot's logic after the Sewn Chaos stuff and now this. I don't know if it's because of the Galio rework (and i highly doubt it) but...those skins are really poor quality. And deep inside i feel bad because Galio gets so much love with amazing reworked skins but themed skins like April Fools get completely crushed. Note that the same thing exactly happened with the Warwick rework where his skins were golden good but Sewn Chaos skins got...well, removed.
-LastDreamy.

-I feel like the only way Riot could possibly get this skin out is by making it more like a disguise Kog'Maw wears (kinda like Dino Gnar). Otherwise, this really doesn't fit into the general LoL theme. Even the skin itself (which is well designed, don't get me wrong) looks odd/wrong compared to the abilities and the voice-over used.
-QualitySupport.

replies.body:
No matter how much we may dislike a skin, bumping 2 year old threads is worse and a violation of the rules.  As such, I'm locking this thread down. 

If you have any questions about this moderation action, don't hesitate to reach out to the Boards Moderation Team via:

* The [**Discuss the Boards**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation) sub-board

{{sticker:poppy-wink}}
If it were Kog in a dog costume I don't think I would despise this thing as much as I do.
PugMaw as a dog costume, at least to me, would look like KogMaw killed a dog and wore his Skin... which would look super disturbing!
10/10 would buy {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

If you think kog'maw would kill a pug just to wear its skin ofc it would be disturbing, but think of it being close like, dino gnar, cottontail fizz, the new moo cow alistar skin, urf nami-tee and panda teemo. just a costume thay wear so we can easily tell its the champion itself.
now its looks more like custom skin that says nothing about being kow'maw at first glance

No, I mean a clearly and obviously terrible dog costume.

Like GIR from Invader Zim sort of terrible.  A cartoonishly inaccurate dog costume that is clearly a costume.  Like Dinosaur Gnar.  No one is going to mistake him for wearing a dead dinosaur.
If you made it bloody yeah sure, but if it looked sewn there wouldn't be much trouble... currently the pug skin looks like hybrid dinosaur and dog, what kind of dog walks on two legs????
One with only two legs. Like Kog'Maw has!

Gimme
As much as I respect your opinion, pugs are my favorite breed of dog so this is a dream come true for me {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
It looks like a custom skin of the type Kshaway would use in one of his videos

I don't see what it is with you haters. Pug maw is one of the coolest skins in the game. Like Urf Warwick or Commander Garen matches the game either. You are just mad because your champion doesn't get any cool skins. Pug maw should definitely get into the game and it will.
this is like, what an april fools skin right? I think it fits pretty well with the others
I main ADC ezreal but my fav dogs r pugs after seeing this skin I started playing log every game he's gonna be my 2nd main I'm so ready I LOVE THIS PUG MAW SKIN PLEASE COME OUT WITH IT THANKS (:

I agree. It's a pretty cute concept but the hyperrealistic visuals of the skin do not mesh well with the painterly style of League. I think Kog'Maw in a cute pug costume would have been more elegant :)

I would instantly buy Pug'Maw (in its first, more detailed PBE iteration) if the skin is released. Some players enjoy fun/silly/creepy skins. April Fools has, for the last few years, been the time of year that Riot releases skins that cater to these players' aesthetic preferences. 

Pug'Maw should be released because the League of Legends community is comprised of a wide variety of people with a wide variety of preferences. Riot has serious and "cool" skin series, from the Warren/Marauder skin line to the PROJECT and Battlecast series. You have the complete freedom to play as an alien invader, demon lord, cupcake zombie, cyborg ninja, Christmas tree, rainbow pony, etc. You do not have to like or play Pug'Maw.

A comical, creepy pug skin will not negatively impact your League experience, especially if you have no interest in purchasing it. Other players will buy this skin and enjoy using it. Not every player will appreciate every skin, champion, or icon. That is why there are hundreds of them.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
yeah, I don't really care for the skin personally, but if they want to release it, it doesn't affect me at all.

Riot. I dont want to be rude, but, this looks like a Leaguecraft custom skin. You have a complete team of professional designers, you can do it better or more contextual, like, idk, maybe Kog, with a.  well made dog disguise and barking?
I don't hate the skin, but , it can look more contextual.
This skin makes me vomit uncontrollably when I see it its disfigured and really bad like I can't look at it or I vomit.

why were the blitz and amumu skins canceled btw?

sewn chaos blitz and amumu was canceled because it was to *low quality* even though both skins was just 750 rp each, alot people complaind it was to garbage and ugly or *to low quality* as riot stated, so thay just canceled both skins with splash art and everything done.
that's not why, they were cancelled because they did not reach the quality bar, they don't plan on bringing back the skins anytime soon
